metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8756 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the search result view in the Indexed Search (indexed_search) component in TYPO3 6.2.x before 6.2.16 allows remote authenticated editors to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
